name: The Rorschach Experiment
description:
The Rorschach Experiment is a school project made under 4 months

After an incident in the labs, you don’t remember who you are. You must try to escape, but the creature that roams in the different floors will not make it easy 

“Your eyes can deceive you…“ 

The Rorschach Experiment is a first-person horror adventure game. Play as a scientist and try to survive in a lab that has been destroyed by a mysterious creature. Use your new ability to see things you never saw before, but don’t use it too much, or you will lose your life. Hide and don’t make too much noise, or you might regret it. 

Mordant Edouard - Prog & VFX 

Delvallée Sami - 3D Modelling and texturing 

Beauchamp Léo - Character design & Artist 

Chevalier Vincenzo - Level art, UI & Texturing 

Czulowski Arsen - Level Design
